title: I cant connect to the servers
body: Hey guys I am having issues connecting to the Serves. My client shows that i am disconnected even though I can go online on my other applications. Please help

replies.body: Your internet is probably working normally but there might still be something making it hard for your network to reach our servers. Do a quick checkup on your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure everything is configured in the best way for League.
